channel.title: PerezHilton
channel.description: Since 2004, Hollywood's most sassy website has been delivering the juiciest celebrity gossip. The blog is The go-to source for daily happenings in Hollywood. Written by the internet's most notorious gossip columnist, Perez Hilton (Mario Lavandeira).

item.title: Best Dressed Celebs Of The Week!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Now that the Spring Breakers promotional tour is winding down, we're really going to miss seeing these two lovely ladies' red carpet looks! Selena Gomez and Vanessa Hudgens made our Best Dressed list yet again this week and that's because they not only know how to take risks, but they pull them off flawlessly. Super [...]
item.content:encoded:
Now that the Spring Breakers promotional tour is winding down, we're really going to miss seeing these two lovely ladies' red carpet looks!

Selena Gomez and Vanessa Hudgens made our Best Dressed list yet again this week and that's because they not only know how to take risks, but they pull them off flawlessly. Super chic princesses right here!

Speaking of of the fashion elite....

item.title: Gucci Mane Fell Asleep During His Spring Breakers Sex Scene!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Nothing can satisfy Gucci Mane like a nice fat joint…not even sex! The rapper/actor was so stoned on the set of Spring Breakers that he fell asleep while he was being filmed gettin' nasty. Even though Gucci's sex partner could balance 5 cans on her booty and rode him for 45 minutes, it just wasn't [...]
item.content:encoded:
Nothing can satisfy Gucci Mane like a nice fat joint...not even sex!

The rapper/actor was so stoned on the set of Spring Breakers that he fell asleep while he was being filmed gettin' nasty.

Even though Gucci's sex partner could balance 5 cans on her booty and rode him for 45 minutes, it just wasn't enough to interrupt Gucci's REM cycle.

Director Harmony Korine spilled:

"In his entourage, everybody smokes weed from the beginning of the day to the end. So we’re inside this house in St. Petersburg, and the f*cking weed smoke was so insane and Gucci was basically catatonic. I was like, 'Gucci, you’ve got to have sex with this chick now!' He wanted her to ride him so he wouldn’t have to do any physical labor. So we’re shooting the sequence, and as he is getting f*cked, I start to hear snores. He had literally passed out! And she was riding his d*ck the whole time. I’d never in my life filmed a sex scene where the dude was sleeping. At the end, he woke up and was like, 'I feel real nice. I feel like Mozart’s on my d*ck.' And that was it, and he went back to sleep."

Whoa!

Sounds like an award-worthy performance to us! HA!

Thankfully for Gucci, the stoned look worked well for his gangsta' character.

We should take this as a lesson to not toke up while on the job.

Right, Rihanna??! LOLz.

[Image via WENN.]

item.title: Hilary Duff And Mike Comrie Do Date Night At Craig's!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Talk about a much deserved date night! Hilary Duff and hubby Mike Comrie said good night to baby Luca and stepped out for dinner at Craig’s in West Hollywood Thursday night! The two held hands and looked oh-so-in-love as they walked to the restaurant. Perhaps they were even celebrating their adorbs babe’s first steps! The Lizzie McGuire actress [...]
item.content:encoded:
Talk about a much deserved date night!

Hilary Duff and hubby Mike Comrie said good night to baby Luca and stepped out for dinner at Craig’s in West Hollywood Thursday night! The two held hands and looked oh-so-in-love as they walked to the restaurant.

Perhaps they were even celebrating their adorbs babe’s first steps!

The Lizzie McGuire actress flashed a huge smile and looked FIERCE with her perfect coif, leather bottoms, and a Celine handbag.

Hope you lovebirds had a fabulous time!

[Image via ROLO/AKM-GSI.]

item.content:encoded:
Ryan Gosling's Acting Range - watch more funny videos

Ryan Gosling can't take a break from acting!

Just look at all the acting range we'll lose!

Ch-ch-check out the video (above) for a HIGHlarious hypothetical look into the Drive star's process!

You know you've made it when you're getting spoofed on Funny Or Die! You have to stay!

How is anyone going to parody directing?

item.title: Anti-Bigotry Video Makes Us Wonder: What Would The World Be Like Without Hatred?
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: In today's edition of "Ponder This While Choking Back Tears" we introduce to you a VERY poignant, beautifully crafted PSA from the Anti-Defamation League, titled Imagine A World Without Hate. Grab a kleenex and press play (above)! The creative concept portrays a potential future where those who have died in the past as a result [...]
item.content:encoded:
In today's edition of "Ponder This While Choking Back Tears" we introduce to you a VERY poignant, beautifully crafted PSA from the Anti-Defamation League, titled Imagine A World Without Hate.

Grab a kleenex and press play (above)!

The creative concept portrays a potential future where those who have died in the past as a result of hate-fueled crimes are still alive as pivotal members of a global society.

Fusing the music of John Lennon with imagery of Martin Luther King Jr., Anne Frank, Matthew Shepard, and others, this is a video that needs to be viewed on every screen!!

Humans for a humane world! Whoop whoop!

item.content:encoded:

Ch-ch-check out the video (above) to see Lena Dunham face off against the gold-toothed James Franco!

Drugs, nudity, awkward conversations... maybe they're more similar than we thought! LOLz!

P.S. CLICK HERE to "follow" Perez on Twitter!

P.P.S. CLICK HERE to "like" Perez on Facebook!

item.title: Game Of Thrones' Peter Dinklage Looks Tired Of Winter!!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: We loooooooove us some Peter Dinklage around here! It just sucks to have to see him — and others — so bundled up in NYC! We bet he wishes winter was still coming instead of already being here! Or that it would just go away. Probably the last one. LOLz!! We're so excited for the new season of [...]
item.content:encoded:
We loooooooove us some Peter Dinklage around here!

It just sucks to have to see him -- and others -- so bundled up in NYC! We bet he wishes winter was still coming instead of already being here! Or that it would just go away.

Probably the last one. LOLz!!

We're so excited for the new season of Game of Thrones that we're getting all kinds of weird dragon boners (should we call it Game of Bones?? Ha!), especially when they keep releasing trailers and the Khaleesi keeps her eye on that throne!

The new X-Men movie is gonna be fab too, and we can't wait to see what Peter has in store for that!

Clutch that coffee, Peter! It'll warm you up!

[Image via

item.title: Johnny Depp Wants To Party With YOU!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Or at least party on his yacht! It'll cost you to float atop the seas in celebrity style, though. While Johnny Depp is busy being one of the hottest dudes in Hollywood his modest 156-foot megayacht is up for grabs for you and your 10 closest friends in Palm Beach. …And it is JUST $130,000 per week! To [...]
item.content:encoded:
Or at least party on his yacht!

It'll cost you to float atop the seas in celebrity style, though.

While Johnny Depp is busy being one of the hottest dudes in Hollywood his modest 156-foot megayacht is up for grabs for you and your 10 closest friends in Palm Beach.

...And it is JUST $130,000 per week!

To walk the same deck Jack Sparrow has walked??

Sounds like a bargain to us!

Who knows! He could stop by for an impromptu guitar sesh!

[Image via Comic Books And Sex Tumblr.]

item.title: Reese Witherspoon Slashes Price On Her Dreamy Ojai Ranch!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: $7.25 million??! What a steal! But in all seriousness, Reese Witherspoon's Ojai ranch is GOR-geous and it has just been reduced by $3 million for YOU to buy! The four bedroom, three bathroom California property features a library, swimming pool, barn, horse paddock, and numerous guest cottages. In regards to the property, Reese told Elle Decor: “It [...]
item.content:encoded:
$7.25 million??! What a steal!

But in all seriousness, Reese Witherspoon's Ojai ranch is GOR-geous and it has just been reduced by $3 million for YOU to buy!

The four bedroom, three bathroom California property features a library, swimming pool, barn, horse paddock, and numerous guest cottages.

In regards to the property, Reese told Elle Decor:

“It reminds me of growing up in Tennessee, where we spent all day outside,” she divulged. “I wanted my children to have that experience, to get muddy and hang out with the animals.It is meditative and restorative. As soon as I drive through the gate, I relax. The air is fresh, the phone isn’t ringing, you can’t access e-mail."

Not only did Reese have her wedding in the backyard, but Robert Pattinson also famously hid out in one of the cottages after news broke of Kristen Stewart's affair.

Talk about a piece of Hollywood history!

Grab it while you can!

[Image via WENN.]

item.title: Author George R. R. Martin Will NOT Cameo In Game Of Thrones Season 3!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: The best-selling Game Of Thones book series has became a smash hit HBO show, thanks to great adaptation Usually as show runner, David Benioff is rewriting author George R. R. Martin, but this time it's George doing the correcting! David mistakenly said viewers could see the writer onscreen this season, but George says it's not gonna [...]
item.content:encoded:
The best-selling Game Of Thones book series has became a smash hit HBO show, thanks to great adaptation

Usually as show runner, David Benioff is rewriting author George R. R. Martin, but this time it's George doing the correcting!

David mistakenly said viewers could see the writer onscreen this season, but George says it's not gonna happen!

Ch-ch-check out the video (above) to see the father of the fantasy series explain why he will NOT be doing a cameo in the upcoming Season 3- and why if he ever does another cameo, he has to be sitting down!

Look, just as long as George doesn't hurt himself sitting on that sword chair! We need him to write the rest of those books already!
